title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may work hard to cover up or compensate for your physical or emotional vulnerabilities today. The delicate Pisces Moons presence in your 8th House of Intimacy amplifies your insecurities about how others perceive your fragility. But in your attempt to conceal what you consider a shortcoming, you might inadvertently hide the best parts of who you are in the process. Thankfully, with patience and persistence, weaknesses can eventually become strengths. A friend is willing to help you improve, but only if you allow them to see the real you. Dr. Bren Brown wrote, What makes you vulnerable makes you beautiful. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
